summary.description:
A tool for detecting linked HIV-1 drug resistance mutations in next generation sequencing data.

A script detect and calculate Linked HIV drug resistant mutations on single HIV genomes.

HIV-DRLink_github.pl is a script that detects and calculates Linked HIV drug resistant mutations on single HIV genomes.

The HIV Databases cover HIV sequences, HIV molecular immunology, HIV drug resistance mutations and nonhuman primate HIV SIV vaccine trials.

The HIV databases contain comprehensive data on HIV genetic sequences and immunological epitopes
summary.name: HIV-DRLink
